original_title: Siete en la mira II: La furia de la venganza
overview: A surviving member of the Siete En La Mira gang sets out to avenge his dead brother and recover the ashes from his cremation. The two lawmen that killed him are dead now themselves, but they have a third brother who wasn't involved in the original conflict.
title: Siete en la mira II: La furia de la venganza
